headline.main: Defense Firm: Former Owners, Exec to Blame for Humvee Fraud
headline.print_headline: Defense Firm: Former Owners, Exec to Blame for Humvee Fraud

lead_paragraph: A Pennsylvania defense contractor said two brothers who formerly owned the company, and their former chief financial officer, are to blame for an alleged $6 million scheme to overcharge the Defense Department for Humvee window kits.
snippet: A Pennsylvania defense contractor said two brothers who formerly owned the company, and their former chief financial officer, are to blame for an alleged $6 million scheme to overcharge the Defense Department for Humvee window kits....
